mapper.select: select t2.*, t1.id as shopping_cart_pk_id, t1.goods_count, cast(t2.original_price as char) AS original_price_str, cast(t2.sale_price as char) AS sale_price_str, t3.name AS merchant_name from sp_shopping_cart t1 right join sp_goods t2 on t1.goods_id = t2.goods_id right join sp_merchant t3 on t2.merchant_id = t3.merchant_id where t1.user_id=#{loginUserId}
